Labs.

Startups we support

We are building the next generation of companies across various industries, all united by a commitment to our core principles. Our ventures aim to transform industries, starting with finance and banking, and expand into sectors like gaming, healthcare, agriculture, and technology. Each business we create is designed to disrupt, innovate, and bring prosperity to overlooked communities.

Daya (www.daya.africa) - Daya is a digital + data bank for Africans.
